overview: From 2025-03-08 to 2025-03-09, elizaos/eliza had 72 new PRs (36 merged), 0 new issues, and 34 active contributors.

completedItems.title: Add core types.
completedItems.body: This enables index.d.ts to be built in /dist. I was seeing no types available errors on imports.
